# imageConfiguration

**Instance Property**

An image configuration object compatible with this trait collection.

## Declaration

```swift
var imageConfiguration: UIImage.Configuration { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIImage/Configuration-swift.class] object in this property contains the same traits as the current trait collection.
title: imageConfiguration
